Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.web

Class SocketServerToClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.web.SocketServerToClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class SocketServerToClient extends Object implements Runnable
Class SocketServerToClient is the class used to create a connection between the Server and the clients.
Author:
Alessio Piovesan, Pier Giorgio Prosperi, Matteo Salamone
See Also:
Runnable
